(Ok, I'm just amazingly confused.  First off, the bat-probes that Airly has.  
Aren't those illegal?  I mean, characters like that that can just be 
manufactured continuously?  I'm not sure, though.

And then, I'm confused about Airly's attacks with her characters. Airly, 
please have your squads and such fire independently.  I don't know who is in 
the Amazon Squad, or who's in Dragon's team.  Or who a "repli-like shape" is. 
 You're gonna have to be a tad more specific.

Now, I need Yanshosh to get online so I can discuss this and other stuff with 
him.  But, I've gotta leave in two hours, because I'm going bowling and 
seeing "Little Nicky" with an older brother of mine.  That may take 3-4 
hours.  Then when I get home I have to move a ton of wood around my house, 
which will take a couple hours.  Then I'm going to have to fight with my 
brother for control of an online server!  So, sorry, there's going to be a 
mass delay on my part.  I got to get ready now.  

So, I'm going to have to ask that the battle be paused.  Though, I've never 
seen a battle paused.  So, I'm asking that you LEAVE Vehement and his base 
out of it.

Because I'll just be dumping all of my characters on Yan if he doesn't help 
sort this crap out.  But, Vehement is a new character full of agendas, same 
with his two minions, and I can't give them to Yan.

Now, if you'll excuse me, I have to write another e-mail to Yan telling him 
what all my characters do)


Lord Unitron
KSLawDogg@...
